answers.answer: It could be the pregnancy symptoms but I would go to the doctor to be sure... tiredness could be a sign of low iron so the doctor might prescribe you some iron supplements
Thank you!  I worried about sugar cause its worse if I dont get a chance to eat. I have a special needs daughter and a 2 year old and I work so a lot going on lol
Headaches are also a sign of preeclampsia.. I had it with my first son. Def go to the Dr. Hope everything goes well!

I'm the same way I get really bad headaches n this is my 5th baby I'm pregnant with n my dr try everythin to get rid of these headaches but nothin dnt work so she put me on tabs n they work. Ever since I got pregnant with twins I had these bad headaches n that was 4 years ago n the meds I was on I cnt take while I'm pregnant so I have to take tabs for them.

I hope everything will be ok... I know being pregnant and being a mom at the same time is hard but it's not impossible. . Just make sure your getting the iron and calcium you need for you and your baby

Thank you all! I got a appointment for the 17th and I tried calling to get it earlier but they said they was booked all this week and couldn't see me until the 17th. And hopefully then I can find out if I will have a little boy or my 3rd girl

question: I am almost 25 and this will be my third child. I have a 5 year old little girl and a 2 year old. Both those pregnancies was really easy for me but this one isn't so smooth.  I feel sick alot and get headaches everyday now.  And I am so tired all the time.  I am 19 weeks as of this last Thursday.  Do yall think the headaches are part of pregnancy and will go away eventually?
title: headaches
